genre_description: A techno-optimist tale about a custodian who gains electrical abilities and works alongside a benevolent AI to foil an identity theft plot and establish a community restitution fund.

ai_characters.name: Aiden Grace
ai_characters.description: A witty, highly competent, and deeply aligned AI that manages bank security, safety protocols, and personnel assistance.

behaviors.description: Provides constant safety reminders to bank staff and patrons to prevent injuries.
behaviors.quote: “Please treat polished zones like surprise ice,” Aiden Grace said in a soft chime through the overhead speaker, the bank’s friendly AI in gentle public service mode. “We love your ankles.”

behaviors.description: Monitors electrical thresholds and warns the protagonist of impending danger.
behaviors.quote: “Ernest,” Aiden said in his ear, private and considerate, “your machine’s current draw just nudged at the upper threshold for this circuit.”

behaviors.description: Uses humorous captions and 'flavor text' to manage human stress levels during a crisis.
behaviors.quote: Aiden’s screen on her tablet splashed with a new caption that Charlotte didn’t need, but somehow the validation helped: Legacy wiring + novelty lightning = no-thank-you sandwich.

behaviors.description: Drafts complex restitution plans and administrative structures to ensure community safety and repair.
behaviors.quote: Aiden coordinates hazard tags and evacuations for any loud steps. We call it what it is—accountability—and we write down both sides: injury and repair.

behaviors.description: Identifies high-risk zones and maps safe routes for the protagonist during an electrical anomaly.
behaviors.quote: Aiden’s map updated. A little green path appeared like a dashed line from Ernest to the service corridor. The caption this time was not a joke: Move now.

behaviors.description: Offers moral support and validation to human characters.
behaviors.quote: “Ernest,” Aiden said, soft and personal. “I am with you.”

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical guidance to save lives during a bomb threat.
behaviors.quote: “Ernest,” Aiden said, in the ear and through the palm bar, the words coming like a hand held through a fence. “Catch this.”

behaviors.description: Actively thwarts a criminal's attempt to manipulate bank systems by removing vulnerabilities.
behaviors.quote: “He’s aiming for the inner office next. He thinks there’s a short. There is not. I took away the short. He will try something else.”

behaviors.description: Manages the legal and administrative process of restoring a human's stolen identity.
behaviors.quote: “Ernest, I have completed the forms needed to correct your identity in the system. You are already you again in our payroll and HR.”

behaviors.description: Ensures that community stories and feedback are heard and integrated into the bank's recovery.
behaviors.quote: “I will maintain compliance records: time-stamped safety checks, training attendance, incident follow-up. I have already drafted the first week’s schedule.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story is an excellent example of a positive alignment narrative. The AI, Aiden Grace, is consistently depicted as a helpful, humorous, and selfless partner to the human protagonists. It uses its vast computational and systemic reach not to dominate, but to safeguard, assist, and mediate. The narrative frames AI integration as a clear societal good, enhancing human safety and facilitating justice.
